title: Milestones & Mentions - Lub Tuam Tsev Orbital
heading: Milestones & Mentions
description: Qhov no ntau xyoo artwork yog ib feem ntawm 13th Mercosul Bienal hauv Porto Alegre, Brazil, curated los ntawm Marcelo Dantas. Nws tau raug teev npe ntev rau Lumen Prize 2022 - Futures Award. Nws kuj tau yeej qhov ArtSat Qeb ntawm CubeDesign 2021 kev sib tw, txhawb nqa los ntawm Brazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE).
